reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, flattering, and suitable for various occasions, with one noting it conceals the tummy better than most. The dress receives positive feedback for its fit, with one customer mentioning it hits just at the knee. The material quality and sizing receive mixed reviews - while some find the material nice and true to size, others say it's thin and not suitable for tall women. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I BOUGHT ALL COLORS
items.body: I am quite picky when it comes to clothes, shoes and purses. I normally go shopping in person so I can look at quality, fabric, the sewing technique/design, the feel of itâ€™s fabric against my skin (cheap materials tend to get me itchy and irritated), but due to COVID , I started Shopping for clothes online including Amazon. Iâ€™ve bought about 12 dresses within the last 2 years from Express, H&M, Nordstrom, Macys and Amazon and this simple but cute dress is by far the best purchased Iâ€™ve made online!! The Material, the stitching, design, the fit and feel from neck to arms to knees , this dress is great! Hides big tummies when youâ€™ve eaten too much and back fats and big arms . True to size. I fit 4/6 womanâ€™s (depends on maker the maker) and Iâ€™m a small , the small is not tight nor loose. Itâ€™sjust perfect!! Very flattering and flirtatious in an elegant yet simple way. Skirt part swings when walking â€¦. Love love love this dress!! I literally bought more with different colors.. TRUST ME y Read more
items.author: Suki Love

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty retro-looking
items.body: Nice retro-looking dress. Looks lke something from the â€˜mid to late â€˜60â€™s. Swing, knee-length skirt. Great for office, Church, shopping or a walk in the park. Wear with heels for dress up, sandals or Keds for casual/comfort. The quality appears to be very good. Read more
items.author: ROMY

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars True to size, not the best quality
items.body: Quality is ok but it fits well and true to size Read more
items.author: Alla S

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite dress! But be warned it might run a little large!
items.body: This dress is beautiful! I love the way the fabric is cut and the way the skirt swishes when I walk. I am 5ft 9, 184lbs and I ordered the XL, which seems to be pretty huge on me, so Iâ€™m exchanging for L. Iâ€™m not sure if I just tend to order larger than I need to and itâ€™s catching up with me or if this brand in particular has more generous sizing, but just FYI for anyone out there. I love it so much, Iâ€™m getting it in a couple different color choices! So cute. Read more
items.author: MissE

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering Business Casual Dress
items.body: This dress was incredibly flattering and I got lots of compliments. The 3/4 sleeves, somewhat fitted top, cinched waistline, and knee length flowy skirt complimented my shape. Although the material seemed nice quality overall and I loved the slight stretch, the white top was a little bit see thru and showed my bra lines. I bought this for a business event. Initially I was worried about it, and couldn't tell if it was super cute or made me look like a waitress? I planned to return it, but brought it with me out of town as a backup dress just in case. Well it worked out great because a different dress I was planning to wear didn't pack well and became wrinkled and I didn't have time to iron it so I wore this dress instead and I'm so glad I did! I put on a small cardigan sweater so I didn't feel self conscious about my bra lines showing and felt pretty and confident all night! It was comfortable and well made. Read more
items.author: Crystal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: Fits perfectly! I am 5â€™1 and I got the medium. Perfect for a Christmas Party Or an event! Great quality! Read more
items.author: Kenzie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great color and fit but sleeves are too puffy
items.body: I returned this dress because I found the top of the sleeves to be very puffy and I didn't like how the tie at the neckline looked. However, I loved the purple color. I bought an XL. The size chart indicates that the waist is suitable for 35 inches. I'm at 37 inches and this dress fit perfectly and was very flattering. I just wish the sleeves were different. Read more
items.author: Andrea M. Rotondo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and soft

items.author: Casaundra

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 0 Burgundy, 1 Wine Dot, 0 Purple, 0 Bright Blue, 0 Velvet Black, Black Dot White Top, Black, 1 White Ge, 1 Black Dot, 1 Black Heart, 1 Red Dot R, 1 Red Heart, 1 White Black, 1 Black Pattern. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
